data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Najran, Saudi Arabia the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Najran, Saudi Arabia

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Najran, Saudi Arabia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Najran to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Najran, Saudi Arabia that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Faifi people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, protect the overcomers in Najran, Saudi Arabia, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 2,273 believers in Najran, Saudi Arabia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary:
the state of Najran, Saudi Arabia has a population of 429,300.

We estimate Najran has 2,273 people who might know Jesus, 14,988 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 412,039 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 188 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Najran to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."
